00001 #include <rdk2/rgraphics/rimagediffjpegpacket.h>
00002 
00003 #include "jpegcache.h"
00004 #include "jpegstuff/receivePicture.h"
00005 
00006 #define JPEG_QUALITY 25
00007 
00008 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00009 
00010 void JpegCache::pushPacket(const RImageDiffJpegPacket* packet)
00011 {
00012     TransmissionUnit tu;
00013     tu.k = packet->data.size();
00014     tu.data = new char[tu.k];
00015     for (uint i = 0; i < tu.k; i++) {
00016         tu.data[i] = packet->data[i];
00017     }
00018     tempList.insert(make_pair(packet->packetNumber, tu));
00019 }
00020 
00021 void JpegCache::clearPackets()
00022 {
00023     tempList.clear();
00024 }
00025 
00026 void JpegCache::refreshImage(unsigned char* image, int width, int height)
00027 {
00028     int curNumber = 0;
00029     TransmissionUnit lastTu;
00030     for (map<uint, TransmissionUnit>::iterator it = tempList.begin();
00031     it != tempList.end(); ) {
00032         if (it->first > curNumber) {
00033             transmissionList.append(lastTu);
00034             curNumber++;
00035         }
00036         else {
00037             transmissionList.append(it->second);
00038             lastTu = it->second;
00039             curNumber++;
00040             ++it;
00041         }
00042     }
00043     
00044     ReceivePicture rp;
00045     rp.setsize(width, height);
00046     rp.setZZ(JPEG_QUALITY, 1, 1, &transmissionList, image);
00047 }
